Package no.ntnu.fullstack.marketplace.controller

Class ItemController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.fullstack.marketplace.controller.ItemController
@RestController @CrossOrigin public class ItemController extends Object
Controller for Item objects in the database used to handle requests from the frontend and return responses Handles GET, POST, PUT and DELETE requests for items in the database

  • Method Details

    • getAllItems

      @GetMapping("/item") private List<Item> getAllItems()
      GET request to get all items in the database
      Returns:
      List of all items in the database

    • getAllCategories

      @GetMapping("/item/categories") private List<String> getAllCategories()
      GET request to get all categories in the database
      Returns:
      List of all categories in the database (no duplicates)

    • getItem

      @GetMapping("/item/{id}") private Item getItem(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      GET request to get a specific item in the database
      Parameters:
      id - id of the item to get
      Returns:
      Item object with the specified id

    • deleteItem

      @DeleteMapping("/item/{id}") private void deleteItem(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      DELETE request to delete a specific item in the database
      Parameters:
      id - id of the item to delete

    • saveItem

      @PostMapping("/item/update") private Long saveItem(@RequestBody Item item, @RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String token)
      POST request to update a specific item in the database
      Parameters:
      item - Item object with the updated information
      token - JWT token containing the id of the user, needed in header to verify that the user is allowed to update the item
      Returns:
      id of the updated item

    • newItem

      @PostMapping("/item/new") private Long newItem(@RequestBody Item item)
      POST request to create a new item in the database
      Parameters:
      item - Item object with the information of the new item
      Returns:
      id of the new item
